name: Double R.
description:
Description

Double R. is a Walking Simulator game that attempts to capture the awkwardness and social anxieties introverts often encounter in their lives. Acting as two introverted characters, players are asked to complete some everyday tasks, such as cooking a meal or going to class, that hardly seems difficult, but suddenly become challenging due to the characters’ personalities and reluctance to interact with others.

Controls

W, A, S, D to move
Mouse to look around
Left mouse button to interact

Created By

Tron (Programming, Framework)
Rachel Li (Art, Programming)
Chenwei Jin (Art, Animation)
Rachel Wang (Composer, Audio Design)

Created for NYU Game Center’s Studio 2 (Spring 2019)
